text: Puerto Rico Highway 27 (PR-27) is a north–south avenue located in San Juan, Puerto Rico, known as Avenida José Celso Barbosa. This highway extends from Avenida 65 de Infantería (PR-3) to Avenida Borinquen (PR-36) in Santurce, east of downtown Río Piedras and Hato Rey. ==Major intersections== ==See also== *List of highways numbered 27 ==References== ==External links== * 027 Category:San Juan, Puerto Rico
title: Puerto Rico Highway 27
